code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{BrowserRouter as Router,Routes,Route,useLocation}from'react-router-dom';import NavBar from'./components/Nav';import'./App.css';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import HomePage from'./components/HomePage';import Projects from'./components/Projects';import AboutMe from'./components/AboutMe';import ContactMe from'./components/ContactMe';import Footer from'./components/Footer';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Main(){const location=useLocation();useEffect(()=>{switch(location.pathname){case'/projects':document.title='Projects';break;case'/about':document.title='About Me';break;case'/resume':document.title='Resume';break;case'/contact':document.title='Contact';break;default:document.title='Home';}},[location]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(HomePage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/projects",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Projects,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/about",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AboutMe,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/contact",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ContactMe,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/resume",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Resume,{})})]});}function App(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavBar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Main,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})]});}export default App;
